Class Powerup

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item
      • Powerup

  • public class Powerup
extends Item
    This class holds all info of a powerup: type, activation implementation, and so on.
    Version:
    2013-05-14
    Author:
    Jonathan Olergård, Jack Shabo

        public Powerup(int X,

        Create a new Powerup on given coordinates X and Y, with default size and speed.
        Parameters:
        X - The X coordinate to spawn upon.
        Y - The Y cordinate to spawn upon.
